=== Team Updates ===

==== Release Overview ====

** 10.04.3 - released 7/21
*** Release notes: https://wiki.ubuntu.com/LucidLynx/ReleaseNotes/ChangeSummary/10.04.3
*** Feedback session held on 7/22.  https://wiki.ubuntu.com/LucidLynx/10.04.3/Feedback

** Lubuntu daily images now available as of 7/27
  
** Unscheduled Debian Archive synch occured on 7/27
*** Side effect from testing new launchpad sync feature.
*** Summary of affected packages can be found at: http://people.canonical.com/~didrocks/sync110727/

** 11.10 A3 - scheduled 8/4,  Soft Freeze 8/1 1200 UTC

** 11.10 Feature Freeze - scheduled 8/11 1800 UTC.
*** Please get your changes in well before then, if possible.  
*** Pre-warning of things that will be nudging against the freeze would be appreciated.
